QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride in Darnassus
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Jartsam.$B$BJartsam can be found at the Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the pamphlet to Jartsam at the Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
